text: Butte County is a county in the U.S. state of Idaho. As of the 2020 census, 2,574 people lived there. The county seat and largest city is Arco. It was founded in 1917. == Communities == === Cities === * Arco * Butte City * Moore === Unincorporated communities === * Darlington * Lost River * Howe == References == Category:1913 establishments in Idaho Category:Idaho counties
title: Butte County, Idaho
